item.title: Random Thoughts on My Everyday Life
item.description: 2022.9.6 - Titanic Project Ends This project now comes to an end, I haven’t finished it; but it has reached its deadline. Now it’s time to summarize what I have learnt for my future growth. First of all, “copy” before you actually go. For this project, I was very confused with where to start and what to be completed to proceed to the next steps. It is not a shame to look at others notebook, learn from them; it even worthes to make everything they do true at my own workstation.
